duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide logistical support for Special Events including, deployment and programming electronic variable message boards, traffic control, and wayfinding.
Set up and pick up barricades, lane cones, and warning signs to channel traffic around work crews.
Install signposts, street signs, check for maintenance, and replace broken signs as needed.
Coordinate with Park City Police, Transit, and other departments during emergency situations to ensure safety of City personnel and residents.
Responsible for contacting Blue Stakes prior to performing work on streets, curbs, sidewalks, and stormwater system to ensure safety of operation.
Perform street lighting installation and maintenance for City lighting network; assist with the installation, repair, and maintenance of street lighting systems.

Utilize IT equipment to enter, retrieve, review, or modify data; verify accuracy of entered data and make corrections; utilize word processing, work order database, email, and other computer programs.
Monitor and evaluate the work of contract service providers; oversee contract labor and construction projects; provide input in the development of contracts.
Perform skilled functions related to the repair and maintenance of all street assets.
Assist in storm control activities such as placing sandbags, barricades, and picking up litter or debris.

education_certification.credential: Must maintain a DOT physical card with the ability to obtain a Class B Commercial Driver’s License with Air Brake.
